ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "While not true ratatouille, my son jokingly calls it that. For those of us who planted too much, this dish is a fantastic way to use up those prolific zucchini. Serve sprinkled with Parmesan cheese. Serve it with polenta for a filling meatless meal. It is great reheated for a quick lunch."
ins: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; saute onion and bell pepper until softened, 5 to 10 minutes. Add zucchini, water, tomato paste, garlic, and oregano; cover skillet and simmer over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until zucchini is softened and transparent, about 20 minutes.
